title: Gas prices are down, everything else is up
itunes:title: Gas prices are down, everything else is up
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: Almost everything became more expensive in August. We’ll discuss key items in the consumer price index and look at one number that dropped — the Census Bureau’s measure of child poverty rates. Plus, the U.S. enters a sorta trade agreement, a real estate agent talks housing market trends and researchers analyze plants to forecast wildfires.
